mapper.select: SELECT distinct wgs84Lon as lon, wgs84Lat as lat from tclinfo
select distinct a.* from tcl_basics a inner join tclinfo b on a.tb_hpid = b.hpid where tb_hpid = #{tb_hpid}

select distinct t.dutyName as dutyName, t.hpid as hpid , t.hvec as hvec , t.hvgc as hvgc from ( select * from emergencyinfo where (hpid, hvidate) in ( select hpid, max(hvidate) from tclinfo group by hpid ) order by hvidate desc ) t group by t.hpid
